text: Could not start wife car on 30 Dec 2024 and contacted them for onsite battery replacement services. Response was fast. However, the newly replaced battery could not work as wife car (BMW 116i 2022 model) required registration with the car control unit. The mechanic was unable to fix the issue. Paid full amount of $380 out of kind gesture and subsequent replaced the battery at BMW authorised center at $900!

Battery died on an early Morning during a Public Holiday. Always wanted to upgrade to a Lithium-Ion battery. Contacted several companies that sold TSAPA, only Swift replied quickly.

His service was Professional & Prompt. Showed me that TSAPA has a ‚ÄúJump-Start‚Äù feature. And reminded me to register the warranty online asap. üëèüèºüí™üèº

I was told that the AGM battery they sold me was not authentic. The AGM battery which I paid a premium to replace died shortly after 1 year They did not want to honour their 1 year warranty even though it only lapsed 5 days. Be forewarned and suggest not to use their service just cos their price looks cheap.

Terence was a very friendly, nice and wonderful guy. He attended to my problems swiftly and got straight to the point. He explains what he is going to do to repair my car and it's simple and easy to understand. The car battery job was done very efficiently and the job was done very professionally. Thank you, will highly recommend

Got back from work and car battery was dead as I forgot to off the headlights. Googled and saw Swift Battery Specialist, gave them a call and Terence immediately came up. Helping to diagnose the issue and was able to swiftly fix my car battery. Throughout, Terence acted professionally and gave a profound sense of composure and knowledgeable in what he does.

Overall, highly recommend, price was reasonable and service as expectational.
